effect.black_white: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
effect.black_2_white_2: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.

short_effect.black_white: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Prevents the target from leaving battle.

flavor_text.black_white: The user blocks the target’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user blocks the target’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.
